1.content: Backend Development - Core Event Service API
1.details:
1. Set up Node.js/TypeScript backend with Express
2. Implement Event model with validation
3. Create authentication middleware (Bearer token)
4. Build all required endpoints:
   - POST /events (create)
   - PATCH /events/:id (update status/notes)
   - GET /events (admin query with filters)
   - GET /public/events (public query)
   - GET /public/events/:id/summary (SSE + AI summary)
5. Implement status transition logic
6. Add mock notification service

6. Include comprehensive error handling
